## Pull request for skbold-package

# Module(s) that has (have) been modified/fixed
1. `transformers.mean_euclidean.MeanEuclidean`
2. `transformers.cluster_threshold.ClusterThreshold`

# Description of modification/fix

2. Updated docstring
